mapper.sql: id, name, id_card_number, mobile, reg_time, state, type, love_point, love_fund, role_id, open_id, sex, address, email, comment, org_name, org_num, old_name, old_mobile, school, school_num, create_time, update_time, is_delete
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from user_tb
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into user_tb (id, name, id_card_number, mobile, reg_time, state, type, love_point, love_fund, role_id, open_id, sex, address, email, comment, org_name, org_num, old_name, old_mobile, school, school_num, create_time, update_time, is_delete ) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idCardNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lovePoint,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{loveFund,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{roleId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{openId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oldName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oldMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{school,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{schoolNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{isDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER} )

update user_tb
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
id_card_number = #{idCardNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
